name: Haven (itch) (Temerity_Games)
description:
Haven is a Tarot based, GM-less story about a sanctuary unstuck from the laws of time and space.  Its Staff strives to help its Patrons work through what is ailing them. Players take on the roles of Staffers, Patrons, denizens of the surrounding area, and the Haven itself. 

Mechanics based on The Quiet Year by Avery Alder and Anomaly by Carter Richmond.

Haven works best with 3-5 players and should take 2-4 hours to play. 

To play you will need half of a 78-card tarot deck, a handful of six-sided dice, and some pens and paper. 

Cover image by Victor Garcia.
